attributes.action: abolish the Edexcel Diploma in Digital Applications course in ICT (DiDA) taught to 14-16 year olds as a replacement for a GCSE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Edexcel DiDA course is taught to GCSE pupils instead of a GCSE course. This course consists of 100% coursework, and students normally spend two years merly compleating a project and not learning any life skills. This course should not be allowed by QCA.
